scenes.description: Takanashi Kiara and Ouro Kronii performing 'CH4NGE'.
MC and transition following the performance of 'CH4NGE'.
Takanashi Kiara and La+ Darknesss performing 'FAKE HEART'.
MC and transition following the performance of 'FAKE HEART'.
Takanashi Kiara, Hiodoshi Ao, and Ichijou Ririka performing 'Feeling Gradation'.
